section.heading: Criminal history checks.
section.text: The Department shall require a controlling person or persons to submit to a criminal history record check. All costs associated with obtaining a background check shall be the responsibility of the appraisal management company.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 112 of Appraisal Management Company Regulation Emergency Act of 2019 (D.C. Act 23-110, July 31, 2019, 66 DCR 178).
For temporary (225 days) creation of this section, see § 112 of Appraisal Management Company Regulation Temporary Act of 2020 (D.C. Law 23-140, Oct. 20, 2020, 67 DCR 9891).
